body: You are passingly familiar with almost every subject and have dabbled in numerous fields and activities. You gain a competence bonus equal to your tier on all untrained skill checks. You can attempt all skill checks untrained, even if the skill normally cannot be used untrained.
name: Master Dilettante
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Trickster/1st-Tier Trickster Path Abilities/Master Dilettante
